channel.title: Where next on my pure?
channel.description:
[img]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/6012/statsfm.png[/img]
What to train next? err bot ofcourse.
Oh and is it worth it getting 80 str? seeing as I only use str in an attempt to kO...
Oh and I only pk on f2p
Is prayer worth it?

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @I_C_Y_Pure Love
item.description:
@I_C_Y_Pure wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:7, topic:317124”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=413667.msg3049347#msg3049347 date=1259986678]
If you put in the work and get 90+ strength then you should also get 31 prayer.
If you really wish to use range most of the time then 44 should be the highest prayer level you obtain.

For the record, everyone on f2p that is worth attacking will be wearing monks robes anyway. 31 prayer, with 90+ strength, would add at least a few damage to your max hit.
[/quote]

Should I just forget about prayer at 80 strength then? The advantage is good and 15% bonus is much easier to train for with 31 prayer rather than going to the respective strength level.[/quote]

I’d get prayer, only once your range\str is 90+.
Even then, 31 should be your max, as it’s really not needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:6, topic:317124”]If you put in the work and get 90+ strength then you should also get 31 prayer.
If you really wish to use range most of the time then 44 should be the highest prayer level you obtain.

For the record, everyone on f2p that is worth attacking will be wearing monks robes anyway. 31 prayer, with 90+ strength, would add at least a few damage to your max hit.[/quote]

Should I just forget about prayer at 80 strength then? The advantage is good and 15% bonus is much easier to train for with 31 prayer rather than going to the respective strength level.

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

prayer is pretty useless in f2p :S
unless ofcourse youre running like a bitch and you wanna avoid big hits
i use it p2p pking for piety

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:3, topic:317124”][quote author=cane link=topic=413667.msg3046518#msg3046518 date=1259786121]
strength and range to 85?
[/quote]

Probably, on my way to 80 str now… When’s the time to go to 40 defense?

btw, there were about 5 other posts here but now they’re all gone…[/quote]
Don’t go 45 defense unless you get 95+ strength 60-75 attack, 52 prayer, or 85 range because
then you will ruin your cb level for nothing.

Read full topic
